page.title: 14FARMS 3
page.content:
{FARMS IN WINESTEAD}
{FIR TREE FARM:}A few hens are kept to provide eggs for the farmer's own use. There is no hired help in the house.
{WILLOW HOUSE FARM:}The farmhouse was greatly extended in 1984. Being a corner site, one house had to be demolished to make room for the extension.
{MANOR FARM:}The house still stands as it was built in the early 1800's, having been modernised but not extended. There are no Deeds to this house as they were lost when the Solicitors in High Street, Hull were flooded in 1921. At present the rafters of the house are home for a colony of nursing bats, around 100 having been counted in August 1985.
